values.label: Kick-off Meeting and First Workshop
values.content: We will hold our first consortium meeting and have our first workshop, dedicated to the identification of suitable newspapers and of feasible requirements with regard to Natural Language Processing (NLP) and interface design. Duration: 1 day, Place: Lausanne, Organisation: DHLAB, UZH, C2DH.

values.label: Additional Workshop ('Buttercup'): Historical scenarios and user requirements
values.content: During this extra workshop, C2DH team will invite historians colleagues from Luxembourg University and collaboratively work on historical research scenarios, in the same spirit as the first workshop. Duration: 1 day, Place: Campus Belval (Luxemboury), Organisation: C2DH

values.label: Additional Workshop ('Edelweiss'): Historical scenarios and user requirements
values.content: During this extra workshop we will present the first syntheses (white and green papers) of requirements gathered during the previous workshop, and collaboratively work on historical research scenarios to further understand the needs and inform our developements. Duration: 1 day, Place: Basel (CH), Organisation: C2DH, DHLAB, UZH.

values.label: Second Workshop (Laurel): Epistemology and Early Prototypes 1
values.content: During this second workshop we will gather feedback on early prototypes and raise epistemological concerns related to the use of digital tools in history. Duration: 1.5 day, Place: TBD, Organisation: infoclio, UNIL.

values.label: Third Workshop: Second consortium meeting
values.content: This will be our second consortium meeting. Duration: 1 day, Place: TBD, Organisation: DHLAB.

values.label: Fourth Workshop: NLP Shared Task
values.content: This third workshop will be co-located with NLP-DH conference and report about a shared task on NE processing on digitized cultural heritage text material. Duration: 1 day, Place: conference place, Organisation: DHLAB, UZH.

values.label: Fifth Workshop: Epitemology and Prototypes 2
values.content: We will have our third consortium meeting and organize an open workshop about the evaluation of NLP tools and interface prototypes, and about epistemological and methodological aspects. Duration: 2 days, Place: Zurich or TBD, Organisation: UNIL, infoclio.

values.label: Sixth Workshop: Final Evaluation of NLP systems and Interface
values.content: During this sixth workshop project partners will do the final evaluation of tools and interface, to ensure implementation of historical requirements. Duration: 1 day, Place: TBD, Organisation: infoclio, UNIL.

values.label: Seventh Workshop: Open Event on Enrichment and Exploration of Digital Historical Newspapers
values.content: This last workshop will be held at a DH conference and includes an open call to the community about the enrichment and exploration of digital historical newspapers. Duration: 1 day, Place: TBD, Organisation: C2DH.

items.author: @C2DH_LU
items.content: The @snsf_ch funded IMPRESSO project on #textmining in historical newspapers is in the news http://www.tageblatt.lu/mit-einem-klick-durch-200-jahre-zeitung/ …  @C2DH_LU @tageblatt_lu
